example.eg: Have you ever been to New York?
The Beatles were one of the most successful bands ever.
example.egtrans: 甲壳虫乐队是有史以来最成功的乐队。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有史以来, 一直以来

example.eg: I have never, ever, been to Paris.
Did the audience like her? Did they ever!
example.egtrans: 观众喜欢她么？他们究竟喜不喜欢！

dsense.name: ever
dsense.guideword: UK, informal (with such, so: very) (表强调)

example.eg: He's ever so clever.
They were ever mournful of that tragic day.
example.egtrans: 他们始终对那悲剧的一天扼腕叹息。

example.eg: As ever, I didn't understand a word of what he was saying.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一如既往, 如往常一样

example.eg: I saw that comedian live recently and he was funny as ever.
I was sad yesterday, but now I'm better than ever.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 比以前更好的, 变好的

example.eg: I'm sure he won't dare do such a thing ever again.
Women are choosing to stay single more than ever before.
Online news sites enable us to keep up with our ever-changing world.
The situation was becoming ever more serious as war spread across the country.
Ever since she met Dave, she's given up on her other friends.
example.egtrans: 自从她遇见了戴夫，就开始疏远自己的朋友。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 自从, 自...以后, 从...起

example.eg: His wife died a couple of years ago, and he's been depressed ever since.
example.egtrans: 他妻子几年前去世了，自那以后他就一直很抑郁。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 从那时起, 自那以后

example.eg: She was ever so lovely!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不断扩大的，日益扩张的，不断扩展的

example.eg: Charles promised to love Lucy for ever and ever.
I will remember this day forever and ever.
Cinderella married her Prince Charming and they both lived happily ever after.
example.egtrans: 灰姑娘嫁给了她的白马王子，从此他们过上了幸福的生活。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 从此幸福地生活在一起，从此过着幸福快乐的日子

dsense.name: happily ever after, happy ever after

example.eg: The lost cat was found in the attic and the family lived happily ever after.
example.egtrans: 走丢的猫在阁楼上找到了，全家人都很开心。

example.eg: I hardly ever drink in the morning.
example.egtrans: 我几乎没有在早上喝过酒。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 几乎没有过, 极为少见

example.eg: Pop by if ever you feel like a chat.
This method is rarely, if ever, employed today.
Your adventure stories make me want to travel more than ever.  After spending the weekend with him I like him more than ever.
example.egtrans: 你的那些冒险故事让我对旅行的向往比往常程度都要强。和他相处一个周末之后，我对他的喜欢比往常程度都要强。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 比往常程度都要高，比往常程度都要强

example.eg: I shall never ever forget you.
After being mugged twice Miriam scarcely ever left the house.

dsense.name: seldom if ever, seldom, if ever

example.eg: I seldom, if ever, have time to relax and read a book.
Why ever would anyone choose to live here? It's so remote!
